body: These leggings are constructed of a number of iron plates laced together in parallel rows and reinforced with chainmail. Sometimes they take the form of a skirt. The legs are further protected by leather greaves reinforced with iron.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Legs/Iron Lamellar Leg Armor Piece
name: Iron Lamellar Leg Armor Piece
